monsters.name: Dire Rat
monsters.description: A massive rat with razor-sharp teeth and matted, diseased fur.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: The rat lunges with disease-ridden fangs.

specialAbilities.name: Pack Tactics
specialAbilities.description: Advantage on attacks if an ally is within 5 feet of target.

flavorText: A massive rat squeaks aggressively from the shadows!
You hear scratching... a dire rat emerges, eyes gleaming with hunger!
The smell hits you first - then you see the enormous rat!
monsters.defeatedText: The dire rat squeals one final time and collapses.

monsters.name: Cave Wolf
monsters.description: A feral wolf adapted to cave life, with pale fur and acute senses.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: The wolf's jaws snap shut with terrible force.

specialAbilities.name: Pack Tactics
specialAbilities.description: Advantage on attacks if an ally is within 5 feet of target.

specialAbilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
specialAbilities.description: Advantage on Perception checks using hearing or smell.

flavorText: A low growl echoes through the cave... a wolf emerges from the darkness!
Yellow eyes gleam in the shadows - a cave wolf stalks forward!
You hear panting and padding paws. A wolf blocks your path!
monsters.defeatedText: The wolf whimpers and falls still, its hunting days over.

monsters.name: Sabertooth Cat
monsters.description: A prehistoric predator with massive curved fangs and powerful muscles.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: The sabertooth's massive fangs pierce deep!

specialAbilities.name: Pounce
specialAbilities.description: If it moves 20+ feet straight toward a creature and hits with claw, target must succeed DC 14 STR save or be knocked prone.

flavorText: A deafening roar! A sabertooth cat leaps into view, fangs bared!
The ground trembles as a massive predator stalks toward you!
You spot movement - then see the unmistakable silhouette of a sabertooth!
monsters.defeatedText: The mighty sabertooth falls, its reign as apex predator ended.

monsters.name: Rival Caveman
monsters.description: A member of a hostile tribe, armed with crude weapons and fierce determination.

attacks.name: Stone Axe
attacks.description: A crude but deadly stone axe swings at you!

attacks.name: Thrown Rock
attacks.description: A heavy rock hurtles through the air!

specialAbilities.name: Tribal Fury
specialAbilities.description: When reduced below half HP, gains advantage on next attack.

flavorText: A rival caveman emerges, beating his chest and roaring a challenge!
War paint and fury - another tribe's warrior blocks your path!
Grunts and aggressive gestures - this caveman means to fight!
monsters.defeatedText: The rival caveman falls, defeated in combat.

monsters.name: Giant Cave Spider
monsters.description: An enormous arachnid that lurks in dark corners, weaving deadly webs.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: Venomous fangs sink into flesh! (DC 11 CON save or take 2d8 poison damage)

specialAbilities.name: Web Sense
specialAbilities.description: Knows location of any creature touching the same web.

flavorText: You feel sticky strands - too late! A massive spider descends!
Eight legs skitter in the darkness... the spider attacks!
Web everywhere... and at its center, a giant spider waits!
monsters.defeatedText: The spider's legs curl inward as it expires, venom dripping from its fangs.
